titleStmt.title: Advertisement. These are to give notice; that Isaac Thompson (His Majesty's sworn Engine-Maker) hath found out a way with a brass elbow and joint, to fasten a leather pipe upon any common or church engine, which (in case of fire) shall not only carry the water as high and as far to the front of a house, ...
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Isaac, engine-maker.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
